title: Chhat Parba
description: Chhath Puja is a four-day festival that typically takes place in October or November, six days after Diwali. The festival is dedicated to thanking the Sun God for sustaining life on earth .

title: Dashain Parba
description: Dashain, also known as Vijaya Dashami, is the longest and the most significant Hindu festival celebrated in Nepal, Bhutan, and some parts of ikkim and Assam. It is a major festival for the people of Nepali and Bhutanese descent.

title: Holi Parba
description: Holi, also known as the Festival of Colors, is a vibrant and joyous Hindu festival celebrated primarily inberant celebrations, where people play with colors, enjoy festive foods, and share the spirit of camaraderie
